We asked him to face the press but he refused to.
tr: Ondan basının karşısına çıkmasını istedik ama reddetti.

en: We hold that he is not guilty.
We defeated the enemy.
We recoiled from the enemy's offensive.
We got an early start.
We all shall die sooner or later.
tr: Hepimiz er ya da geç öleceğiz.

en: None of us is perfect.
We took pride in our strength.
We are faced with many difficulties.
We foresaw the war.
We had to start for America at short notice.
tr: Amerika'ya kısa sürede gitmek zorunda kaldık.

en: We plan to have a welcoming party for Mr. Clark who came to Japan the other day.
tr: Geçen gün Japonya'ya gelen Bay Clark için bir karşılama partisi düzenlemeyi planlıyoruz.

en: We moved into this house last month, but we still haven't settled down.
tr: Geçen ay bu eve taşındık ama hala yerleşemedik.

en: We moved into this house last month. We will settle down soon.
tr: Geçen ay bu eve taşındık. Yakında yerleşiriz.

en: We thought we had the game in the bag.
We were ordered away without any explanation.
tr: Bize hiçbir açıklama yapmadan gitmemiz emredildi.

en: We've run short of oil.
We must work as long as we live.
We will probably arrive at Tokyo station at noon.
We lost sight of the man in the crowd.
We are but men, not gods.
We were sweating in the heat.
We sat face to face with executives.
That's because we knew our place.
We are not born for ourselves.
